mean_en: made or produced to copy something natural; not real; created by people; not happening naturally; not what it appears to be
sentence: Even with an artificial leg, he can still beat you in a race.
sentence_trans: 尽管有一条假肢，他依然可以跑赢你。
word_etyma: artific技巧 + ial形容词后缀 → 用技巧做出的 → artificial人工的；矫揉造作的
